cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

# We name the project and the target for the ExternalProject_Add() call
# to something that will highlight to the user what we are working on if
# something goes wrong and an error message is produced.

project(eigen-populate NONE)

include(ExternalProject)
ExternalProject_Add(eigen-populate
                     "UPDATE_DISCONNECTED" "False" "GIT_REPOSITORY" "https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen.git" "GIT_TAG" "c1d637433e3b3f9012b226c2c9125c494b470ae6" "GIT_PROGRESS" "TRUE" "PREFIX" "/home/huucuong/cpp/libs/3rdparty/tflite_build"
                    SOURCE_DIR          "/home/huucuong/cpp/libs/3rdparty/tflite_build/eigen"
                    BINARY_DIR          "/home/huucuong/cpp/libs/3rdparty/tflite_build/_deps/eigen-build"
                    CONFIGURE_COMMAND   ""
                    BUILD_COMMAND       ""
                    INSTALL_COMMAND     ""
                    TEST_COMMAND        ""
                    USES_TERMINAL_DOWNLOAD  YES
                    USES_TERMINAL_UPDATE    YES
)
